archimate:ApplicationService.name: AARM2 Application Service
archimate:ApplicationService.documentation:
AARM is a Tietoevry internal service. The service and its associated processes maintains Tietoevry specialists’ user accounts and access rights in Tietoevry and customer services’ user directories 1 Is at its core a Role Based Access-Control (RBAC) system = Duties, Scopes, Direct Roles 2 Runs on One Identity IDM platform
- Secure, traceable and audited mechanisms for authorizing administrators to target servers - Automated provisioning of approved administrator accounts to target servers - Linked to HR data for automated deprovisioning of admin rights - Configurable attestations of existing administrator rights - Enforcing segregation of duties (currently under development)
